title: Oath Keepers Leader Points Finger at Colleagues in Sedition Trial
description: Stewart Rhodes, the founder of the far-right militia, testified that he did not order anyone to go into the Capitol on Jan. 6 and that he had nothing to do with an armed force waiting nearby.
dc:creator: Alan Feuer

media:content.media:description: Members of the Oath Keepers on Jan. 6, 2021. Stewart Rhodes, the groupâ€™s leader, testified that he did not direct the members to enter the Capitol that day.
